ValidationRule.description: Primary Contact MUST have a direct relationship to the End User account + Oppty Contact Role Mapping
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( SBQQ__AmendedContract__c = null, SBQQ__RenewedContract__c = null, ISPICKVAL(Business_Group__c , "Core"), NOT(ISBLANK(Primary_Contact__c)), Primary_Contact__r.AccountId <> AccountId, OR(ISNEW(),ISCLONE(), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATEVALUE('2023-02-26')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid Contact Name related to the Account in this Opportunity
